oasis.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a place with water and trees in a desert
oasis.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a peaceful or pleasant place that is very different from everything around it
oasis.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The park was an oasis of peace.
oasis.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a British rock group who were one of the most popular groups of the 1990s. Their music is an example of Britpop. Their songs, which are written by Noel Gallagher and sung by his brother Liam, include Wonderwall, and their albums include Definitely Maybe (1994) and (What's the Story) Morning Glory?  (1995).
